AssetTitle.name: AssetTitle
AssetTitle.description: Represents information that establishes the legal ownership of an asset or a vehicle.

AssetId.description: The Asset associated with the Asset Title record.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The date on which the validity of the title ends.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The date on which the title is issued.

FinancialAccountId.description: The active Financial Account associated with the asset or vehicle for the Asset Title record.

IsActive.description: Identifies whether the title is active (true) or not (false).

IssueFormat.description: Specifies the format used to issue or transfer the asset title.

IssuePlaceId.description: The place of issue for an asset title.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date when a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date when a user viewed this record.

LienStatus.description: Specifies the lien status of the title.

Name.description: The name of the Asset Title record.

TitleNumber.description: The unique identification number of the title.

Type.description: Specifies the type of condition of the vehicle or asset associated with the title.

VehicleId.description: The vehicle associated with the Asset Title record.

VehicleIdentificationNumber.description: The vehicle identification number of the vehicle associated with a title.
